=== Sheet: Spreadsheet Navigation ===
Sheet | Description
Overview | Information on all of the counties with early childhood programs and degrees that is filterable.
Highlights by County | Lists of counties with combinations of early childhood programs and degrees.
EC Degrees_Details | Information on all of the early childhood degrees and certificates offered by two- and four-year IHEs, including whether the degree or certificate is available online.
Sources and Assumptions | A list of the data sources for the landscape analysis with relevant links and descriptions of the assumptions used to create the landscape analysis.
End of Worksheet

Assumptions
To be considered a county with an Early Learning Program of Study, an LEA must have AT LEAST 3 courses AND offer a Level 3 or 4 Early Learning course.
County service areas for LEAs are based on the headquarters for the LEA; note that some students could reside in a different county.
IHEs with EC Degrees were identified by TXAEYC in January 2023 and service area information for the two-year IHEs from TACC.
